title: Question about the icon+border for Championship Ashe.
body:
Really strange question, but hear me out:

I love the icon, but dislike the border and prefer the base version of the loading splash.

Is it possible to redeem for both, and then e-mail support to just remove the loading border and I can keep the icon?
I know it's a really weird request, but thought I'd ask regardless.

Thanks

-LostFr0st

replies.body: Unfortunately, the icon itself is what activates that border. We won't be able to take the border away without removing that icon =\ .
I'm sorry for stalking u but is boarder that square around champion in loading screen before game? And is there special boarder if you are having that new ashe icon? Sorry for bad english.

Lol it's ok.  Good way to get the answer efficiently.

It's this border:
https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-sDWKX1arpKc/Wa7gjF03onI/AAAAAAAAtiI/JGbtHVuq2g8TOKyfWNzPR_QQqhLYoURMgCLcBGAs/s1600/AsheLoadScreen_9_LE.png

From the Worlds crafting, yes.
https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QhOffWYQBds/WcADGDJkrcI/AAAAAAAAu5E/7Bz-kS9g3w44nKZ44QqSxKI5-EiLvV15wCLcBGAs/s1600/3.jpg

Not the ranked border; that's different:
http://i.imgur.com/ZvjFD1H.jpg
Ty. I kind of like the ashe boarder. Feels bad to not be ashe main :(

Never too late to be Ashe main.
At least you Vayne mains got the gemstone skin though.  Seems quite nice.

Oh i don't play vayne often. Just bought it few days ago and liked her. I main support/jg right now (i only main support, top/mid/jg are my secondary, that are changing)

I know u don't care and i'm ok with it :)

No, it's genuinely cool to know.

I hope you find your main, and that they get a sweet skin too.
Been nice talking to you.
